name: Fugu's Revenge
description:
Help prevent pufferfish at a seafood restaurant from being turned into fugu! Launch the fish at the chef to scare him off, and at coins to buy their freedom while avoiding bombs!

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 84, the theme was "bubbles" and the limitation was "you are your own ammo." This was my first collaboration, all the art and sound design was done by my sibling Meta!

Credits

Programming, voice acting - me
Art, sound design - MetaphysicalMonsters
Music - Abstraction Music
All sound effects found on freesound.com.
Sound effect attributions
